items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.
items.title: haoxiang-xu/PuPu: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: LumeCSS is a modern, lightweight, and highly customizable SCSS library designed to streamline your front-end development process. Built with simplicity and scalability in mind, LumeCSS provides a robust set of utility classes and foundational components to help you create clean, responsive, and aesthetically pleasing web designs with ease.
items.title: NazariyH/LumeCSS: LumeCSS is a modern, lightweight, and highly customizable SCSS library designed to streamline your front-end development process. Built with simplicity and scalability in mind, LumeCSS provides a robust set of utility classes and foundational components to help you create clean, responsive, and aesthetically pleasing web designs with ease.

By allowing you to elegantly augment existing functions with additional behaviourâ€”such as logging, error handling, and more.

items.content_html: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
items.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
